name: directus-strava
description: A directus extension and strava app for backing up strava activities into a directus database

scripts.start: docker run --rm --name directus -p 8055:8055 -v $PWD/db:/directus/database -v $PWD/dist:/directus/extensions/endpoints/strava -e KEY=test -e SECRET=test -e ADMIN_EMAIL=admin@example.com -e ADMIN_PASSWORD=d1r3ctu5 directus/directus
